titles.title: Tomika Mirai Kinkyuu Tai Earth Commander

anime.description: It`s a 10 minute long (plus 5 minutes of toy commercials) promotional OVA based on a line of http://anidb.net/cr1060 [Tomy] transforming vehicle toys.
